IDCard.title: IDCard
IDCard.description: Represents a single user-created ID card.

id.description: Unique identifier for the ID Card, matches the Firestore document ID.

userId.description: The ID of the user who created the card.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the card was created.

idNumber.description: A unique, human-readable ID number for the card.

name.description: The name of the person on the ID card.

dateOfBirth.description: The date of birth on the ID card.

photoDataUri.description: The data URI of the user's photo.

gender.description: The gender of the person on the card.

address.description: The address of the person on the card.

qrCodeDataUri.description: A data URI for the QR code image.

aadhaarNumber.description: The 12-digit Aadhaar number associated with the card, if any.

AadhaarVerification.title: AadhaarVerification
AadhaarVerification.description: Represents the result of a single Aadhaar card verification attempt.

id.description: Unique identifier for the verification record.

userId.description: The ID of the user who performed the verification.

imageDataUri.description: The data URI of the scanned Aadhaar card image.

status.description: The final status of the verification.

indicators.description: A summary of fraud indicators found, or null if none.

aadhaarNumber.description: Aadhaar number extracted from the card.

/users/{userId}/idCards/{cardId}.description: Stores ID cards created by a specific user.

/users/{userId}/aadhaarVerifications/{ve.description: Stores Aadhaar verification history for a user.
